EmailTemplate.subject: Will you join us next week?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Are you or your teammates attending Microsoft Ignite? We are too, and I’d love to offer you an exclusive invitation to a 30-minute meeting with members of our executive team.
During your meeting, we will discuss your priorities, give you VIP insight to our roadmap, share an analysis of the competitive landscape and examine how we can partner to tackle your largest IT initiatives.
Turbonomic is Microsoft’s partner-of-choice for fast, accurate cloud assessments, cloud-ready migration plans and ongoing optimization in Azure. Jointly we are helping customers accelerate their adoption of the public cloud and are committed to helping customers transform their businesses. Some highlights of the partnership include:
- Microsoft and Turbonomic launched a strategic initiative to deliver Cloud Assessments and Cloud Optimization to accelerate our joint customers' journey to Azure - Turbonomic has been selected as a top partner for helping customers accelerate their Azure migration to prepare for Windows/SQL 2008 End of Support
If you’re interested in meeting, simply reply to this email with your preferred date and time. Also, be sure to make a visit to the Turbonomic booth (#315) in the Expo Hall – we look forward to seeing you there!
Regards, Catherine
Catherine Kellogg, Director of Field Marketing
